name: DracoFighter Pre-Demo
description:
WELCOME TO DRACOFIGHTER

The 4-Button Dragon Fighter! Play as a dragon and fight others with the incredibly simple control scheme! Experience the complexity of fighting games without the complex inputs!

CURRENT VERSION IS PRE-DEMO, FULL DEMO IS BEING WORKED ON

Controls:

P1 - (A) (S) (D) (F)

P2 - (Left Arrow) (Right Arrow) (/. Symbol)

Buttons translate to LEFT, RIGHT, A, and B respectively.
A + B = C

Moveset:
(When facing right, Forward = RIGHT, Back = LEFT)
A = Wing Slap
Forward + A = Double Kick
Back + A = Tail Backflip
B = Fireball
Forward + B = Approaching Flap
Back + B = Retreating Flap
A (while in air) = Falling Kick
C (A+B) = Grab / Dragon Slam

FEEDBACK AND BUG REPORTS (with videos please!) VERY APPRECIATED

PRE-DEMO HAS WIP SPRITES AND FEATURES, THIS IS A WORK IN PROGRESS
